Module: ticker-log

ticker-log
On-screen, ticker-tape-style logging tool

https://github.com/jonbri/ticker-log
https://www.npmjs.com/package/ticker-log

Author:
  • Jonathan Brink
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 1

Methods

(inner) config(o)

Overlay object over configuration object.
Only an api function...doesn't map to a key.
Public+private way of setting configuration properties.

Example:
// change log speed to 400
window._ticker.config({
  interval: 400
});
Parameters:
Name Type Description
o object property/value map to apply
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 264

(inner) decreaseLogStartTop()

"pageUp" api function.
Change starting vertical position (logStartTop) for on-screen logs.
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 700

(inner) decreaseSpeed()

"down" api function.
Increase delay interval by adjustmentInterval.

  • ticker.js, line 545

(inner) dump()

"d" api function.
Show configuration properties in output textarea.

"filter" api function.
Only an api function...doesn't map to a key.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
matcher regex | string either a string or regex to filter log by

"pageDown" api function.
Change starting vertical position (logStartTop) for on-screen logs.

(inner) increaseSpeed()

"up" api function.
Decrease delay interval by half the adjustmentInterval.

(inner) kill()

"k" api function.
Clear render buffer and remove all ticker log dom elements.

(inner) killTextarea()

"Esc" api function.
Remove textarea dom element.

(inner) listenToEverything()

"listenToEverything" api function.
Only an api function...doesn't map to a key.

Listen to all console invocations:
  • all channels
  • regardless if backtick provided
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 921

(inner) macroEdit()

"m" api function.
For macro 9.
Show a textarea where macro can be edited.
"save" macro when textarea is dismissed.

  • ticker.js, line 741

"left" api function.
Change log container position and alignment of log dom elements.

(inner) nextChannel()

"Tab" api function.
Switch to listen to next console channel ("log", "warn", etc).
Order is determined by aChannels.
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 799

(inner) output(bAll)

"o" api function.
Show log text in the "output textarea".
Parameters:
Name Type Description
bAll boolean whether to show all logs ever, OR just the current on-screen ones (default: false)
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 432

(inner) outputAll()

"l" (for "log") api function.
Api function to show all saved log messages.
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 474

(inner) pause()

"p" api function.
Toggle pauseMode config prop boolean.
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 414

(inner) print(text, o)

Print log div to screen.
Only an api function...doesn't map (directly) to a key.

A configuration object can be passed as the second argument:
keyvalue
overrideSilentModestill print, even if silent mode is on
internaldo not track in aBuffer

Example:
// show log on-screen
window._ticker.print('lorum ipsum');

Parameters:
Name Type Description
text string innerHTML for log dom ref
o object configuration object
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 300

(inner) registerMacro(iNumToRegister, fn)

Register (overwrite) macro.
For macros 0-8.
Only an api function...doesn't map to a key.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
iNumToRegister int key in aMacros object to write to
fn function callback function
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 719

(inner) reset()

Reset all settings.
Reverts everything ticker has modified and re-installs from scratch.
Only an api function...doesn't map to a key.
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 877

(inner) restoreAndExit()

"end all ticker operations" api function.
Stop ticker from doing anything.
Reset url param.
Reset console object.
Only an api function...doesn't map to a key.
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 850

(inner) runMacro(iMacroSlot)

"0-9" api function.
Also can be called directly.
Execute macro.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
iMacroSlot int macro in aMacros object to execute
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 778

(inner) saveConfig()

"enter" api function.
Update url (window.location) to "save state".
Only use config props that have changed.
Generate url-friendly, json string to use for "_ticker" param.
Source:
  • ticker.js, line 609

(inner) silent()

"s" api function.
Toggle silentMode config prop boolean.

(inner) test()

"t" api function.
Print out test log (plus date).
